pages.text: $(li)Blindsights are hostile creatures that can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/glowstone_canyon)Glowstone Canyons$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)They will use their strong legs and tongue to jump and snatch $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/glowsquito)Glowsquitos$(/l) or you.$(br)$(li)They may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/infernalexp/blindsight_tongue)Blindsight Tongue$(/l) upon death.
